pageTitle: CALIDA HOLDING-REG (CALN:SIX Swiss Ex): Stock Quote & Company Profile - Businessweek
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {8497=Calida Holding AG announced that they will report Q2, 2015 results on Jul 24, 2015, 4851=CALIDA Holding AG primarily engages in the clothing business in France, Germany, Switzerland, rest of Europe, Asia, the United States, and other countries. The company operates in five divisions: CALIDA, AUBADE, MILLET Mountain Group, FURNITURE, and OXBOW. It offers daywear, sleepwear, loungewear, knit items, and swimwear for women, men, and children under the CALIDA brand name; luxury lingerie under the AUBADE brand name; mountaineering, climbing, and walking gear products for trekking tours, skiing, and speed hiking under the MILLET brand name; and mountain sports clothing under the EIDER brand name. The company also provides clothing and equipment for hiking, travel, and trekking under the LAFUMA Outdoor brand; functional equipment for camping, gardening, and leisure under the LAFUMA Furniture brand; and comfy clothing for sport and leisure under the OXBOW brand. CALIDA Holding AG was founded in 1941 and is headquartered in Oberkirch, Switzerland., 9287=Calida Holding AG, Annual General Meeting, May 12, 2015.}
